metrics.name: SOL-1682 Overdue and open Accounts Receivables
metrics.description: Number of overdue AND open yet not cleared invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL 
            AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
        )

metrics.name: SOL-1682 Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
                        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > "Last Inv. Item Due Date")) > 0
        )
/ COUNT (case_id) * 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)
metrics.description: Average number of days to collect revenue, weighted by the invoice value
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(
    	(SELECT LAST("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")) 
    	- (SELECT FIRST("Inv. Posting Document Date"))
	)
	*(SELECT LAST("Inv. Converted USD Amount"))
)

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Percentage of Baseline Date Changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name MATCHES('Update Baseline Date')
    AND event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice'~>'Update Baseline Date'))
/COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Percentage of Reversed Invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were reversed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name MATCHES('Reverse Invoice'))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Conformance Lewel
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices without conformance issues
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name MATCHES('Create Invoice'~>'Post Invoice'~>'Due Date passed'~>'Clear Invoice'))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Number of Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order
metrics.description: Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE event_name 
    MATCHES(NOT 'Create Billing Document'~> 'Create Invoice'))

metrics.name: SOL-1709 No-Touch Invoice Processing Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of no-touch invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES  (('Remove Dunning Block'
    		|'Set Dunning Block'|'Change Dunning Block'|'Send 1st Overdue Notice'
    		|'Update Baseline Date'|'Update Payment Term'|'Reverse Invoice'))) 
    	AND (event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
	)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL-1709 Early Payment Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before the due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days')
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: SOL_1709 Automation rate for invoice clearing
SOL-1682 Lead time: invoice creation to accounts receivable clearing
metrics.description: Average lead time for items that were cleared within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
    (SELECT LAST("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date") WHERE
        ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_clearing_period}))
    -(SELECT LAST(${invoice_reference_date})WHERE
        ((NOW() - FIRST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_posting_period}))
    )

metricsVariables.name: invoice_reference_date
metricsVariables.description: Attributes identifying which field of the accounting document is used for the calculation of the lead time, for example: "InvoiceAccountingDocumentDate"

metricsVariables.name: invoice_posting_period
metricsVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoices that have been paid, for example, for payments that have been paid at least 1 day ago: '1days'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_clearing_period
metricsVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor cleared invoices, for example, for invoices that were cleared during last week: '7days'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

metricsVariables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricsVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL

children.name: Cycle Time Invoice creation to clearing

dataSource.query:
SELECT "SD Customer Number", 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > DURATION '1days'))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL))
* 100  AS "Late Payment Rate in %",
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'))
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
        WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL))
* 100 AS "Early Payment Rate in %",
COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of invoices",
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Total Amount in USD"
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
GROUP BY 1

LIMIT 10
